div.p: Antioxidant activity of the major terpenes of Satureja macrostema essential oil, determined by three methods: (a) 2,2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl, (b) 2,2’-azinobis-3-ethylbenzothiazoline-6-sulfonic acid, and (c) total antioxidant capacity. Different letters indicate significant differences in each block of concentration ( P ≤ 0.05, n = 6, Tukey's test)
